post.body: lovely indeed~ I really love candles, even though they tried to finish me off last week~ lol~beautiful~
Kids said it's sad N the end~our lab passed 3 days before his 18th b/d~I laid him 2 rest N my garden he always dug in
unbelievable~sheesh~common courtesy dictates at least a thank you~ GG I agree with U~ but I know 2 wrongs won't make it right
ha you only have to look at my burns to answer that question~! Heading to the movies w the girls~ Ben Button to be exact~!
http://twitpic.com/xc2c burns are healing quite nicely~will most likely scar a bit though~face/scalp is looking pretty good
http://twitpic.com/xc2c - burn is healing quite nicely~ will most likely scar~ no help for it~ but face is getting better
screw it~ decided to head to grocers or starbucks first~ can't make it w/o my coffee~ only 1 cup, but that 1 cup is important~!
Morning~Off 2 the soap room 2day~WAY behind due to burn injury~Must make product~get website finished~Work on Gathering~Would kill 4 coffee
a movie so stupid yet sooooo cute
Typical sibling response lol. I lived w/o any siblings so no one to 2 fight with or pic on!
Choc good! Have a creative night!
LoL innocence. I tell mine they were little wishes and dreams then!
